column5: Ensuite private room and private bathroom, queen bed memory foam mattress, walk-in closet, mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, iron/board, laptop table, hair dryer and cable TV. The room is the first floor with large window facing the street. New town home in East Downtown (EADO), an area in re-development, 5 minute drive from downtown and 20 minute walk from convention area and 15 min to light rail stops and easy access to major freeways. You can find bars and restaurants nearby.
